title: Bad Girls (1994) Madeleine Stowe (Quality DVDrip)[opt.SWESUBS]
description:
Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109198/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109198/</a>

With Mary Stuart Masterson (Benny & Joon), Andie MacDowell (Four Weddings and a Funeral), Drew Barrymore (Charlie's Angels).

Madeleine Stowe and the other girls in unusal performances as riding prostitutes in the old Wild West. Great music by Jerry Goldsmith.

It has puzzled me that this great film is only available as old vhs rips on the torrent sites, so I bought a new DVD and made this quality rip.

Widescreen, great stereo sound AC3.
DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x384.

Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
